original_definition: 'rated cooling capacity' means the cooling capacity of a comfort chiller and/or air conditioner or fan coil units when providing space cooling at ‘standard rating conditions’, expressed in kW;
generated_definition: 'rated cooling capacity' means the maximum cooling capacity of a cooling product, as specified by the manufacturer, typically measured in watts (w) or british thermal units per hour (btu/h).

Article 1: cooling products and high temperature process chillers with a rated cooling capacity not exceeding 2 MW;
cooling products andhigh temperature process chillers with arated cooling capacity not exceeding 2 MW;
Article 2:
‘rated cooling capacity’ (Prated,c
) means the cooling capacity of acomfort chillerand/or air conditioner orfan coil units when providing space cooling at ‘standard rating conditions’, expressed in kW;

‘standard rating conditions’ means the operating conditions of comfort chillers, air conditioners and heat pumps under which they are tested to determine their rated heating capacity, rated cooling capacity, sound power level and/or emissions of nitrogen oxides. For products using internal combustion engines, this is the engine rpm equivalent (Erpmequivalent
);

‘standard rating conditions’ means the operating conditions ofcomfort chillers, air conditioners and heat pumps under which they are tested to determine theirrated heating capacity,rated cooling capacity, sound power level and/or emissions of nitrogen oxides. For products using internal combustion engines, this is the engine rpm equivalent (Erpmequivalent
);

‘rated cooling capacity’ (Prated,c
) means the cooling capacity of a comfort chiller and/or air conditioner or fan coil units when providing space cooling at ‘standard rating conditions’, expressed in kW;
Article 9: Water/brine to-water chillers with ≥ 400 kW rated cooling capacity < 1 500  kW when driven by an electric motor
Water/brine to-water chillers with rated cooling capacity < 400 kW when driven by an electric motor
if, for cooling products, the seasonal space cooling energy efficiency ηs,c is not less than the declared value minus 8 % at the rated cooling capacity of the unit;
Air-to-water chillers with rated cooling capacity ≥ 400 kW when driven by an electric motor
Air-to-water chillers with rated cooling capacity ≥ 400 kW, when driven by an internal combustion engine
Water/brine to-water chillers with rated cooling capacity ≥ 1 500  kW when driven by an electric motor
if, forcooling products, the seasonal space cooling energy efficiency ηs,c is not less than the declared value minus 8 % at therated cooling capacity of the unit;
if, forcooling products, the average of the three units for seasonal space cooling energy efficiency ηs,c is not less than the declared value minus 8 % at therated cooling capacity of the unit;
Air-to-water chillers with rated cooling capacity < 400 kW, when driven by an electric motor
if, for cooling products, the average of the three units for seasonal space cooling energy efficiency ηs,c is not less than the declared value minus 8 % at the rated cooling capacity of the unit;
